channel.title: Projects on Francisco Payés
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Francisco Payés

item.title: Text Converter
item.description: Live demo | Github Repository Web tool to convert text into three possible formats: HEX, OCT and ASCII. Also it allows you to copy and paste values with just a simple click. Technologies used: Svelte HTML CSS

item.title: To-do list/stopwatch
item.description: Live demo | Github Repository Web tool to keep track of the time you spend in specific tasks. Technologies used: Vanilla Javascript HTML CSS
